column5: Has anyone fished at Naught Pines Fish Camp?Part of the English river system. Thinking about heading up therenext spring, just wondering if anyone has any experience(s) they would care to share here?Thanks in advance

Was there a few years ago, We stayed at thier outpost at hte bottom of the chain. All and all a good expierence, No big fish for our group,Most bigger fish came from up in the river.Price was alittle high for what we got.
